description: It is understood the circumstances for reducing it include limiting the length of stay to 90 minutes
title: Coronavirus: Irish pubs and restaurants could cut 2m rule
title_page: Coronavirus: Irish pubs and restaurants could cut 2m rule - BBC News
maintext: His association has been critical of the timing of what he called the "drip-feeding" to the media of information about reopening conditions with less than two weeks to go before pubs serving food are due to open.
